Kim Jong Il's Famous Work Published in Haiti 
    Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "Let Us Achieve the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of the Country through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" was published in pamphlet by the Quality Plus Publishing House of Haiti on October 15.
 The work, brought out on April 18, Juche 87 (1998), clarifies the historic five-point policy for great national unity which serves as important guidelines for achieving the great unity of the Korean nation.    
 This policy calls on all the Koreans to unite, improve the relations between the north and the south, struggle against foreign domination, interference and anti-reunification forces and promote contacts, dialogue and unity and solidarity on the principle of national independence under the banner of patriotism, the banner of national reunification.

articles.content:
e102914 - Kim Jong Il Sends Relief Fund to Koreans in Japan
    Pyongyang, October 29 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il sent relief fund amounting to $ 100,000 to the Korean victims of a strong earthquake that hit Chuetsu of Niigata Prefecture, Japan.
 The fund will help bring the living of the compatriots in the afflicted area to normal and greatly encourage the Koreans in Japan who are devoting themselves to the building of a great prosperous powerful nation, the reunification of the country and the strengthening and development of the movement of Koreans in Japan.
